alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:30PM CDT until June 07 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of West Fork, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Winslow... Brentwood... Drake Field Airport... Wyola... Woolsey... Sulphur City... Arnett... Hicks... Durham... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 48 and 50, and between mile markers 54 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
